bibl.title: Traversing Eternity. Texts for the Afterlife from Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Preface. - General Introduction. - Part 1. Osirian texts adapted for the deceased. - Part 2. Texts with the deceased as original beneficiary. - Glossary. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: Mark Smith, Traversing Eternity. Texts for the Afterlife from Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2009, 8°, xx-725 pp., 2 cartes, 14 pll. ISBN 978-0-19-815464-8. £152.
Preface. - General Introduction. - Part 1. Osirian texts adapted for the deceased. - Part 2. Texts with the deceased as original beneficiary. - Glossary. Bibliography.
C.R. par Ivan Guermeur, BibO 70 (2013) coll. 53-57.
